mods.li: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decor

value.description: A dedicated pile of bricks. You can store more bricks here. It is recommended to keep this pile for one type of brick, as fiddling around heavy brick types will take a long time.
A dedicated stack of wooden logs. You can store more logs here.
A medium size wooden chest for storing miscellaneous items. It is fast to use. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A large size wooden chest for storing miscellaneous items. It is fast to use. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

A large size wooden box for storing miscellaneous items. It is slow to use. Storing a big variety of items in a single box will increase storing time. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

A small size wooden box for storing miscellaneous items. It is slow to use. Storing a big variety of items in a single box will increase storing time. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A pallet of wooden boxes for storing miscellaneous items. It is slow to use. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
An armor stand. It can store armor. Items stored can deteriorate.
An armor stand. It can store armor. Items stored here will not be visible but can deteriorate.

A large size cardboard box for storing miscellaneous items. It is slow to use. Storing a big variety of items in a single box will increase storing time. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

A small size wooden box for storing miscellaneous items. It is slow to use. Storing a big variety of items in a single box will increase storing time. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A pallet of cardboard boxes for storing miscellaneous items. It is slow to use. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A tall cabinet that can hold items like food, drugs and medicine. It is fast to use. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A metal locker unit. You can store apparel here. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.

A vending machine. Your pawns refuse to pay for using it, though. You can store a great variety of items here, so long they are small enough to fit. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="DZ_VFEPD_BarrelGreen" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_BarrelGrey" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_BarrelRed" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_BarrelYellow" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_BarrelBlue"]/description

value.description: A steel barrel. You can store chemicals and loose items here. You better not dare mixing different items here. Doing so will increase the storing time an inmense amount because it would require to make chambers inside to keep the items separate. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="DZ_VFEPD_PalletBarrelGreen" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_PalletBarrelGrey" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_PalletBarrelRed" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_PalletBarrelYellow" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_PalletBarrelBlue"]/description

value.description: A pallet of steel barrels. You can store a variety of chemicals and loose items here. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A civilized and nice looking bottle storage rack. You can store a drinks here. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A large flat pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Sometimes difficult to manage, but useful nonetheless.
An impassable warehouse shelf. Can store heavy things. Items stored here can deteriorate.
An impassable warehouse shelf with cardboard boxes. Can store most items. Items stored here can deteriorate.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="DZ_VFEPD_ContainerGreen" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_ContainerGrey" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_ContainerRed" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_ContainerYellow" or defName="DZ_VFEPD_ContainerBlue"]/description

value.description: A metal cargo container. You can store many items here and they won't deteriorate even if outside. This building is a bit slow to use, though. Passable. Cannot hold roof.
A small block of hay. You can store hay here, what a shocker.
A block of hay. You can store hay here, what a shocker.
A large roll of hay. You can store hay here, what a shocker.
A large stationary wagon. Can hold various things. Items stored here can deteriorate.
Some storage bags for storage. You can store dry and light loose items here. Too much variety will increase the time it takes to use this storage. Items stored here will not deteriorate
A medium sized, triple sealed, password protected box. You can store any kind of item here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A large sized, triple sealed, password protected box. You can store any kind of item here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A large stack of triple sealed, password protected box. It is slow to use. You can store any kind of item here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A large, multi-chamber advanced storage device. You can store any kind of item here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.

mods.li: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decor

value.description: A bookshelf capable of holding a variety of books, tomes and publications. This building will not prevent deterioration.

mods.li: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decor
